name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sanemi Shinazugawa: Strength and Determination in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embody the strength and fierce spirit of Sanemi Shinazugawa with bold visuals and easy shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the fierce power of Sanemi Shinazugawa, featuring wind-inspired visuals and an intense atmosphere.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold and clean interface that reflects Sanemi’s strength and determination, perfect for a focused browsing experience.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a stylish clock that matches the theme of the Wind Hashira.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with easy-to-access shortcuts.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy engaging games directly from your browser, adding fun to your experience.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search quickly using your chosen search engine with the built-in search bar.
🚀 More Extension: Add features and customization options inspired by Sanemi Shinazugawa to enhance your browsing experience.
